trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallbackBuilder" /> that can be used to add attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallbackBuilder" /> que pode ser usado para adicionar atributos.

trans-unit.source: Called when attributes are needed for a type.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando os atributos são necessários para um tipo.

trans-unit.source: This callback enables delayed registration of metadata attributes as well as the ability to provide code that dynamically determines which attributes should be applied.
trans-unit.target: Esse retorno de chamada habilita o registro posterior de atributos de metadados, bem como a capacidade de fornecer código que dinamicamente determina quais atributos devem ser aplicados.

trans-unit.source: This callback is provided to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder.AddCallback%2A> method of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse retorno de chamada é fornecido para o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder.AddCallback%2A> método o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallbackBuilder> objects can build attributes only for the type that is requesting metadata.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeCallbackBuilder> objetos podem criar atributos somente para o tipo que está solicitando metadados.
